Class QuizServerProxyImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, QuizServerProxy

extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements QuizServerProxy

      Joins a quiz thats specified by the given code.

      Increases the question-index of the quiz by 1 and returns the question pointed to by the question-index in the quiz object.

                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: QuizServerProxy

                                           java.lang.String userId,
                                           int time)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: QuizServerProxy
        Increases the Highscore of an user in the specified quiz given by the code.
        Specified by:
        increaseHighscore in interface QuizServerProxy
        Parameters:
        code - A random generated alphanumeric code, that specifies a quiz.
        userId - User-if of the user, which highscore will be increased.
        time - The remaining time the user had after he clicked the correct answer.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the highscore got increased.
